name: Hide From The Dark
description:
You wake up on an island and don't remember how you got there. You don't have anything on you.  To live, you have to:
  • Search for food  
  • Gather materials  
  • Craft tools 
  • Hunt 

But most importantly, when it gets dark, don't go anywhere without a light source... 

Goal? Survive.
